name: BitCoin One
description: BitCoin ONE is a community driven project Decentralized meaning no state or company is controlling it, the Ecosystem is based on people helping out in marketing, support & development. We are developing projects with a use case, that be Wallets and Mobile Crypto APP. We have a good set of core values. We even have a pool with 2 million BTCONE / 2 million B1P allocated for charity projects. This is to be distributed to 40 different projects around the globe.
